entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Blind River
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 late in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. High plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 12 February 2023
